perturbation.original_text:
1.     DEFINITIONS
     1.1     "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" means the SpinRecords.com name and
logo  and  other  trademarks,  trade  names  and service names including but not
limited  to  those set forth on Exhibit A attached hereto and incorporated herein
                               ---------
by  reference  and  all  Intellectual  Property  Rights  related  thereto.
SpinRecords.com  Brand  Features  shall include any derivatives, improvements or
modifications  thereto  or  thereof and any Intellectual Property rights related
thereto.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.     DEFINITIONS
     1.1     "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" means the SpinRecords.com name and
logo  and  other  trademarks,  trade  names  and service names including but not
limited  to  those set forth on Exhibit A attached hereto and incorporated herein
                               ---------
by  reference  and  all  Intellectual  Property  Rights  related  thereto.
SpinRecords.com Brand Features shall ONLY include the logo as it exists on the effective date and none of the other listed properties.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the definition of 'Spinrecords.com Brand Features'. Originally, it included the name, logo, trademarks, and any derivatives/improvements. The modified version restricts it to ONLY the logo as it exists on the effective date, excluding all other listed items and future changes. This contradiction will cause disputes about what is considered a 'Spinrecords.com Brand Feature' throughout the rest of the contract.

perturbation.original_text:
1.4     "Intellectual  Property  Rights"  means  all  current  and  future
worldwide trademark, patents and patent rights, utility models, copyrights, mask
work  rights,  trade secrets, and all other intellectual property rights and the
related  documentation  or  other  tangible  expression  thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.4     "Intellectual  Property  Rights"  means ONLY current trademark and patent rights, and nothing else.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by significantly narrowing the definition of 'Intellectual Property Rights'. The original definition included a broad range of current and future rights (patents, copyrights, trade secrets, etc.). The modified version restricts it to ONLY current trademark and patent rights, excluding other forms of IP. This contradiction will create uncertainty about what IP is protected under various clauses of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted
             ---------------------
by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad
revenue  at  an  average  rate  no lower then $6.50 per one thousand impressions
(CPM)  payable  to  NETTAXI  which  results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising
Revenue  is  multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share.  SpinRecords.com shall be
responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except
taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted
             ---------------------
by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad
revenue, but the rate of payment will be determined at the sole discretion of SpinRecords.com each quarter.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the payment rate. The original version stipulates a specific formula including a minimum rate of $6.50 per thousand impressions. The modified version removes the formula and minimum rate, stating that the rate will be determined at the sole discretion of SpinRecords.com each quarter. This creates uncertainty about NETTAXI's expected revenue and whether SpinRecords.com can arbitrarily lower the payment rate.
